original: 為劉備屬下。曹劉爭漢中時，他從於吳蘭對抗曹洪，吳蘭見曹軍勢大，想暫時撤退，但任䕫不從，徑自出戰，被曹洪軍所殺。
text: Liu Bei's subordinate. When Cao Liu competed in Hanzhong, he fought against Cao Hong from Wu Lan. Wu Lan saw that Cao's army was strong and wanted to retreat temporarily, but he refused to follow him and went out to fight and was killed by Cao Hongjun.
